snippet: As Syrians mark the first anniversary of the uprising against President Bashar al-Assad, exiles have been eagerly reading a cache of e-mails, said to be the private correspondence of the regime's first couple.
abstract: As Syrians mark the first anniversary of the uprising against President Bashar al-Assad, exiles have been eagerly reading a cache of e-mails, said to be the private correspondence of the regime's first couple.

headline.main: Syria's First Couple and the Banality of E-Mail
